mapper.select: WITH W1 AS ( SELECT SUM(NVL(STPL_DSC_AMT, 0)) AS STPL_DSC_AMT FROM TB_SSCT_RENTAL_RSTL_IZ -- 렌탈재약정내역 WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND RSTL_STAT_CD = '020' -- 확정 AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(STPL_STRTDT, 1, 6) <= #{slClYmFrom} ) SELECT /* 1.매출실적자료가 생성되지 않은 경우는 1개월 렌탈료 */ /* 2.첫달이 설치월인 경우는 매출실적의 렌탈료 */ /* 3.첫달이 설치월이 아닌 경우는 1개월 렌탈료 */ CASE WHEN B.SL_CL_YM IS NULL THEN D1.AMT1 WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CNTR_PD_STRTDT), 'YYYYMM') = B.SL_CL_YM AND B.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21', '23') THEN NVL(B.THM_SL_SUM_AMT, 0) --LCAM16 당월매출합계금액 WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CNTR_PD_STRTDT), 'YYYYMM') = B.SL_CL_YM THEN NVL(B.THM_BIL_OC_AMT, 0) - NVL(B.THM_BIL_CTR_AMT, 0) + NVL(B.THM_BIL_SPMT_AMT, 0) -- B.LCMAM2-B.LCMAM4+B.LCMAM5+B.LCCAM2-B.LCCAM4+B.LCCAM5+B.LCSAM2-B.LCSAM4+B.LCSAM5 ELSE D1.AMT1 END + /* 사이의 월은 월단위 렌탈료 계산 */ CASE WHEN D1.MNTHS <= 1 THEN 0 ELSE D1.AMT1 * (D1.MNTHS-1) END + /* 종료월 일할계산된 렌탈료 계산 */ CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#{slClYmTo}, 7, 2) = D1.LST_DD OR CAST(SUBSTR(#{slClYmTo}, 7, 2) AS INTEGER) >= 30 THEN D1.AMT1 ELSE TRUNC(D1.AMT1 / 30 * CAST(SUBSTR(#{slClYmTo}, 7, 2) AS INTEGER) , -1) END AS PRM_DP_AMT -- 선입금금액 , NVL(D2.CURR_MAMT,0) AS PRM_BLAM_EOT_AMT --미수금액 , NVL(D2.CURR_AM36,0) AS THM_ATAM_DP_AMT --선수금액 , NVL(B.RENTAL_TN, 0) AS RENTAL_TN -- 렌탈차월 , NVL(D1.AMT1, 0) AS RENTAL_AMT -- 월렌탈료 FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A --계약상세 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ B --시작월 매출실적 ON B.SL_CL_YM = #{slClYmFrom} AND B.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND B.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN LATERAL ( /* 날짜 및 기본 렌탈료 조회 */ SELECT MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{slClYmTo}, 1, 6)||'01'), TO_DATE(#{slClYmFrom}||'01')) AS MNTHS -- 시작-종료월 개월수 , EXTRACT (DAY FROM LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{slClYmTo}, 1, 6)||'-01'))) AS LST_DD -- 최종일 , CASE WHEN B.RENTAL_TN IS NULL THEN NVL(B.RENTAL_AMT, 0) - NVL(B.RENTAL_DSC_AMT, 0) -- LCAMT1-LCRAM1(렌탈료1-렌탈할인1) WHEN B.RENTAL_TN <= B.CNTR_PTRM THEN NVL(B.RENTAL_AMT, 0) - NVL(B.RENTAL_DSC_AMT, 0) - (SELECT NVL(STPL_DSC_AMT, 0) FROM W1)-- A.LCAMT1-A.LCRAM1-B.LCRAM3 (렌탈료1-렌탈할인1-재약정할인) ELSE NVL(B.RENTAL_AMT2, 0) - NVL(B.RENTAL_DSC_AMT2, 0) - (SELECT NVL(STPL_DSC_AMT, 0) FROM W1) -- A.LCAMT2-A.LCRAM2-B.LCRAM3 (렌탈료2-렌탈할인2-재약정할인) END AMT1 /* 재약정 및 변동구간 반영된 월렌탈료 */ FROM DUAL ) D1 ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL ( /* 당월 미수/선수금액 조회 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /* 월마감 자료 생성전에는 전월실적자료 조회 */ CASE WHEN A.SL_CL_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN NVL(B.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(B.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) - NVL(B.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT, 0) - NVL(B.THM_CTR_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(B.THM_DLQ_ADD_RFND_SUM_AMT, 0) + NVL(C.EOT_BOR_AMT, 0) -- 연체금액 LCDAMT ELSE NVL(A.EOT_UC_AMT, 0) + NVL(B.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(C.EOT_BOR_AMT, 0) -- 미수금액 LCMAMT (TOBE는 연체가산, 위약금 미포함) END CURR_MAMT , A.EOT_ATAM AS CURR_AM36 -- 선수기말 LCAM36 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS B ON B.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND B.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND B.PERF_YM = A.SL_CL_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_BOR_AMT_BAS C -- WELLS위약금액기본 ON C.PERF_YM = A.SL_CL_YM AND C.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND C.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND C.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ORDER BY A.SL_CL_YM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) D2 ON 1=1 WHERE A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
